item.title: Using Turbo C++ in Windows 7 along with graphics support
item.description: DOSBox Use dosbox to mount and run TC.EXE Download DOSBox here… Mounting Z:\>MOUNT C "PATH OF BIN" Z:\>C: C:\>TC [TURBO C++ IDE opens] NB: You can include the codes for mounting and running in - C:\\Users\\username\\AppData\\Local\\DOSBox\\dosbox-0.74.conf - file at its end as autoexecute commands on startup; so that it will be executed automatically on every startup of DOSBox. To run in fullscreen mode edit the .
